title: Cinefantastique Vol 03 No 2 (Spring 1974)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Articles on The Golden Voyage of Sinbad, The Exorcist, I Married a Monster from Outer Space, Old Dracula (aka Vampira), Armicus Productions, interviews with Richard Matheson and Michael Crichton (Westworld), and reviews of Dracula (1973), The Exorcist, Frankenstein: The True Story, The Killing Kind, The Legend of Hell House, O Lucky Man, Private Parts, Raw Meat, A Reflection of Fear and many more.
